description.description: A short description used for social media.

icon.description:
File name (with extension) of an image in config/images.

Image used for the favicon. SVG preferred.
icon.markdownDescription:
File name (with extension) of an image in `config/images`.

Image used for the favicon. SVG preferred.

appleIconPNG.description:
File name (with extension) of an image in config/images.

180x180 PNG used for the home screen on Apple devices.
appleIconPNG.markdownDescription:
File name (with extension) of an image in `config/images`.

180x180 PNG used for the home screen on Apple devices.

defaultTheme.description:
File name (with extension) of a CSS theme in config/themes.

The theme to use on first launch.
defaultTheme.markdownDescription:
File name (with extension) of a CSS theme in `config/themes`.

The theme to use on first launch.

fontOverride.description: The name of a Google Font. Leave blank to use the system font.

profile.description: Config for the top profile section

image.description:
File name (with extension) of an image in config/images.

Profile picture to display above the links.
image.markdownDescription:
File name (with extension) of an image in `config/images`.

Profile picture to display above the links.

title.description: Name or heading to display above the links.

description.description: A short description to display above the links.
